== Implementation ==
LaTexLab will build on top of the [http://code.google.com/p/gdbe/ Google Docs Base Editor (GDBE)]. The client-side will use plain [http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/overview.html GWT]. On the server will sit the Python GData libraries for Google Docs integration.

For compiling LaTeX documents, the [http://code.google.com/p/common-latex-service-interface/ Common LaTeX Service Interface (CLSI)] is used.

You can contribute to this project by contributing to the [http://code.google.com/p/gdbe/ GDBE] and [http://code.google.com/p/common-latex-service-interface/ CLSI] projects as well.
